p: Starting from compound 1 (0.200 g, 1.22 × 10 −3 mol) and using ethyl 4-bromobutyrate (0.19 mL, 1.34 × 10 −3 mol), compound 2e was obtained as a colorless oil (0.249 g, 73% yield). R f = 0.44 (ethyl acetate/light petroleum 1:10). 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz): δ H = 1.24 (3H, t, J = 8.4 Hz, CO 2CH 2CH 3), 2.14 (2H, quint, J = 6.4 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 2.53 (2H, t, J = 7.2 Hz, OCH 2CH 2C H 2 CO 2CH 2CH 3), 3.33 (2H, d, J = 6.8 Hz, CH 2Ph), 3.85 (3H, s, OC H 3 ), 4.04 (2H, t, J = 6.4 Hz, OC H 2 CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 4.14 (2H, q, J = 7.2 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2C H 2 CH 3), 5.04–5.11 (2H, m, CH=CH 2), 5.91–6.01 (1H, m, CH=CH 2) 6.69–6.72 (2H, H-3 and H-5), 6.82 (1H, d, J = 7.2, H-6) ppm. 13C NMR (CDCl 3, 100.6 MHz): δ C = 14.14 (OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2 CH 3), 24.57 (OCH 2 CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 30.73 (OCH 2CH 2 CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 39.74 ( CH 2Ph), 55.85 (O CH 3), 60.31 (OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2 CH 2CH 3), 68.09 (CO CH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2CH 2CH 3), 112.41 (C-3) 113.60 (C-6), 115.54 (CH = CH 2), 120.44 (C-5), 133.06 (C-4), 137.60 ( CH = CH 2), 146.58 (C-1), 149.46 (C-2), 173.20 ( CO 2CH 2CH 3) ppm. HRMS: m/z (ESI) calculated for C 16H 23O 4 [M+1] + = 279.1591; found = 279.1592.
